00046 template<class TestPage, class TestFixture>
00047 class SingleLaunchPageTestCase: public INSTRUMENTATIONTESTCASE {
00048   private:
00049     gaia::base::String mPageClass;
00050     static bool msPageLaunchedFlag;
00054     static Page* mspPage;

00058     TestPage* getPage();
00059     void testPageTestCaseSetUpProperly();
00060   protected:
00061     virtual void SetUp();
00062     static void TearDownTestCase();

00070 template<class TestPage, class TestFixture>
00071 bool
00072 SingleLaunchPageTestCase<TestPage, TestFixture>::msPageLaunchedFlag = false;
00073 template<class TestPage, class TestFixture>
00074 Page* SingleLaunchPageTestCase<TestPage, TestFixture>::mspPage = NULL;
00075 
00076 template<class TestPage, class TestFixture>
00077 SingleLaunchPageTestCase<TestPage, TestFixture>::SingleLaunchPageTestCase()
00078         : mPageClass(gaia::core::GetClassName<TestPage>()) {
00079 }
00080 template<class TestPage, class TestFixture>
00081 SingleLaunchPageTestCase<TestPage, TestFixture>::~SingleLaunchPageTestCase() {
00082 }
00083 template<class TestPage, class TestFixture>
00084 TestPage* SingleLaunchPageTestCase<TestPage, TestFixture>::getPage() {
00085     return static_cast<TestPage*>(mspPage);
00086 }
00087 template<class TestPage, class TestFixture>
00088 void SingleLaunchPageTestCase<TestPage, TestFixture>::SetUp() {
00089     InstrumentationTestCase < TestFixture > ::SetUp();
00090     // If it is the first test case, launch the page.
00091     if (!msPageLaunchedFlag) {
00092         // by default, not in touch mode
00093         this->getInstrumentation()->setInTouchMode(false);
00094         String targetPackage =
00095                 this->getInstrumentation()->
00096                 getTargetContext()->getPackageName();
00097         mspPage = this->launchPage(targetPackage, mPageClass, NULL);
00098         msPageLaunchedFlag = true;
00099     }
00100 }
00101 
00102 template<class TestPage, class TestFixture>
00103 void SingleLaunchPageTestCase<TestPage, TestFixture>::TearDownTestCase() {
00104     mspPage->finish();
00105     msPageLaunchedFlag = false;
00106     mspPage = NULL;
00107 }
00108 }  // testing
